author: grapebaba
content: https://github.com/ethereum/portal-network-specs/issues/130 what is the status for this, and i thought we may could add multi compress algo support such as Brotli

author: kolbyml
content: Doesn't Brotli have high CPU overhead compared to snappy?

author: grapebaba
content: I didn't do benchmark, but see it is also adopted by some project
